meanings.definition: The quality or state of being aggressive in entering or penetrating
meanings.sent1: His ingressivenesses was evident as he pushed his way through the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The ingressivenesses of the team helped them secure victory in the game.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's ingressivenesses in finding nuts was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The ingressivenesses of the river carving through the canyon was awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The lion's ingressivenesses in hunting its prey was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The tendency to be assertive or forceful in gaining entrance or access
meanings.sent1: Her ingressivenesses at the job interview impressed the hiring manager.
meanings.sent2: The ingressivenesses of the salesperson helped close the deal quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its ingressivenesses by meowing loudly at the closed door.
meanings.sent4: The ingressivenesses of the storm breaking through the clouds was dramatic.
meanings.sent5: The ingressivenesses of the waves crashing against the shore was powerful.
